name.str: Battle Steel ceramic side plate, NIJ III+
name.str_pl: Battle Steel ceramic side plates, NIJ III+

description: A full-cut ballistic plate with slightly clipped corners and a single-curve profile, made of silicon carbide and wrapped in UHMWPE. Manufacturer's logo is proudly displayed on the outward-facing side.  This plate is rated for NIJ III+, which means it's been tested to survive at least 3 rounds of high-energy rifle rounds, and then some.  Plates like this one are intended to be inserted into a plate carrier where it will absorb the energy of multiple rifle rounds before requiring replacement.  This model is a 6″×6″ side panel and can only fit in side panel pouches on a plate carrier.
damage_verb: makes a crunch, something has shifted

name.str: Hudi's Tactical ceramic tall side plate, NIJ III+
name.str_pl: Hudi's Tactical ceramic tall side plates, NIJ III+

description: A full-cut ballistic plate with slightly clipped corners and a single-curve profile, made of silicon carbide and wrapped in UHMWPE. Manufacturer's logo is proudly displayed on the outward-facing side.  This plate is rated for NIJ IV, which means it's been tested to survive at least 3 rounds of armor-piercing high-energy rifle rounds: some of the most dangerous rounds out there.  Plates like this one are intended to be inserted into a plate carrier where it will absorb the energy of multiple rifle rounds before requiring replacement.  This model is a 6″×8″ side panel and can only fit in side panel pouches on a plate carrier.
damage_verb: makes a crunch, something has shifted
